source: To be, or not to be, that is the question.
target: The speaker is wondering whether it's better to live or die.

source: Parting is such sweet sorrow.
target: Saying goodbye is painful but also beautiful.

source: Thou art more lovely and more temperate.
target: You are more beautiful and calm than anything else.

source: All that glitters is not gold.
target: Not everything that looks valuable is truly valuable.

source: The lady doth protest too much, methinks.
target: She's denying too strongly—it seems suspicious.

source: What light through yonder window breaks?
target: What is that light coming from the window?

source: Now is the winter of our discontent.
target: We are currently in a time of unhappiness or trouble.

source: Out, damned spot! Out, I say!
target: Get off, stain of guilt! I'm trying to be free of it.

source: I am one who loved not wisely but too well.
target: I loved too deeply, though not wisely.

source: A horse! A horse! My kingdom for a horse!
target: I'd give anything, even my kingdom, for a horse right now.

source: Neither a borrower nor a lender be.
target: Don’t borrow or lend money.

source: Something is rotten in the state of Denmark.
target: Something suspicious or bad is happening in Denmark.

source: The better part of Valour, is Discretion.
target: True courage often involves knowing when to avoid danger.

source: Et tu, Brute?
target: You too, Brutus? Even you betrayed me?

source: Though she be but little, she is fierce.
target: She may be small, but she is very strong and bold.

source: All the world’s a stage, and all the men and women merely players.
target: Life is like a play and people just play roles.

source: Brevity is the soul of wit.
target: Being brief is the key to intelligence or humor.

source: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
target: Things are not good or bad by themselves—it’s how we see them.

source: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
target: Cowards fear death over and over, but brave people face it only once.

source: Hell is empty and all the devils are here.
target: This place is so bad, it's like all the devils have left hell and come here.

source: To be, or not to be, that is the question.
target: The speaker is wondering whether it's better to live or die.

source: This was written by my friend from the Samaritan family.
target: The text's author is a member of the Samaritan community.

source: The software update will deploy tomorrow.
target: A new software update is scheduled for tomorrow.

source: The sun sets in the west.
target: The sun goes down in the western part of the sky.

source: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
target: To start a long journey, you must take the first step.

source: Knowledge is power.
target: Having knowledge gives you strength and influence.

source: Actions speak louder than words.
target: What you do is more important than what you say.

source: Time heals all wounds.
target: With time, emotional pain will lessen.

source: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
target: What is beautiful depends on who is looking.

source: When in Rome, do as the Romans do.
target: Follow the customs of the place you are visiting.

source: The pen is mightier than the sword.
target: Writing is more powerful than violence.

source: A picture is worth a thousand words.
target: An image can express complex ideas better than words.

source: The early bird catches the worm.
target: Those who wake up early have an advantage.

source: A stitch in time saves nine.
target: Fixing a small problem now prevents bigger problems later.

source: You can’t judge a book by its cover.
target: Don’t judge something based only on its appearance.

source: The grass is always greener on the other side.
target: People often think others have it better than they do.

source: Every cloud has a silver lining.
target: There is something good in every bad situation.

source: Better late than never.
target: It’s better to do something late than not do it at all.
